meanings.sent1: The orogenesis of the Rockies took millions of years.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study orogenesis to understand how mountains are created.
meanings.sent3: The orogenesis of the hills seemed like a slow dance over time.
meanings.sent4: The orogenesis of the peaks was like nature sculpting its own masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The orogenesis of the Alps was a majestic sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The study of the origin and development of mountains.
meanings.sent1: Learning about orogenesis helps us understand how mountains form.
meanings.sent2: Geologists use orogenesis to explore the history of mountain ranges.
meanings.sent3: The class on orogenesis made the students feel like mountain detectives.
meanings.sent4: In the world of geology, orogenesis is like solving a mountain mystery.
meanings.sent5: The book on orogenesis painted a vivid picture of mountain evolution.
